title: French onion and bacon quiche
ingredients: ['For the pastry', '225g (8 oz) plain flour', '110g (4 oz) lard', '2 tablespoons water', '55g (2 oz) freshly grated cheese', 'For the filling', '450g (1 lb) onions, thinly sliced', '110g (4 oz) butter', '225g (8 oz) streaky bacon, chopped', '2 eggs', '300ml (1/2 pt) milk', 'pepper, to taste', '2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce']
